description: A fast, versatile, remote (and local) file-copying tool

global_options.description: Compress file data during the transfer
Delete extraneous files from dest dirs
Perform a trial run with no changes made
Specify the remote shell to use
Output numbers in a human-readable format
Skip based on checksum, not mod-time & size
Skip files that are newer on the receiver

type.data: (cat ~/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null | cut -d' ' -f1 | cut -d',' -f1 | grep -v '^\['; grep -E '^Host ' ~/.ssh/config 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}' | grep -v '*') | sort -u | sed 's/$/:/' 2>/dev/null
(cat ~/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null | cut -d' ' -f1 | cut -d',' -f1 | grep -v '^\['; grep -E '^Host ' ~/.ssh/config 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}' | grep -v '*') | sort -u | sed 's/$/:/' 2>/dev/null
